column4: i dont know *how* this happened but on my laptop i have: unison version 2.27.57, but on desktop i have: unison version 2.13.16.... although both computers are running ubuntu hardy.  on desktop i did sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install unison; but got message: unison is already the newest version. ... ideas?
I think you can run do-release-upgrade --help for a list, and go from there.
run that on the desktop (one with older version)?
